Dr. Xiahong Wang, a researcher inneurology and epilepsy at Children’s Hospital Boston in the Longwood Medical Area, will speak in Mandarin on epilepsy.-December 4, 2012 - IN MANDARIN - 7:00 pm

We have general discussion from 6:00 pm-7:00 pm, a DISCUSSION TOPIC at 7:00 pm, and DISCUSSION (in Mandarin) from 7:30 -8:00 pm (then adjourn slightly after - but NOT before - 8:00 pm).

The schedule:
6:00 - 7:00 pm - General Discussion - BOTH Mandarin & English
7:00 - 7:30 pm - FOCUSED DISCUSSION TOPIC

Dr. Xiahong Wang, a researcher in neurology and epilepsy at Children’s Hospital Boston in the Longwood Medical Area,will speak in Mandarin on epilepsy.

7:30 - 8:00 pm- Mandarin discussion of Mandarin talk -General discussion in Mandarin will follow our speaker's talk.

The TUESDAY evening event is ALWAYS in at the Harvard School of Public Health, 677 Huntington Avenue, in the Longwood Medical Area, Boston, MA 02115 (near Mission Hill).

Check http://Chinese.Mandarin.com/35/ for details.

You are WELCOME and ENCOURAGED to forward this to interested friends.
item.name: Lecture in Mandarin - 'Challenges of epilepsy in China, USA, and globally'
